text: @racheljulie @JessicaValenti @NYGovCuomo Try Parmesan hard cheese for the COVID19 pectin virus avoiding. It's ST12 from Borg in Sweden. ST16 was used in Scotland and also held patent by Borg. Alcohol is only useful for the investigation unit use was Borg's suggestion.
